website_summaries.verdict: Create a generous pour with these 20 oz. handmade crystal glasses.
pros: The bowl shape is clean and modern looking, as well as being ideal for full-bodied red wines, directing the flow of the wine and balancing the acidity
cons: These are sold as dishwasher safe, but are very delicate and may require hand washing

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: This modern take on the typical red wine glass is beautiful and a pleasure to use. I don't think I want to use them on my deck table that seems to be a little unstable, but for the dinner table or a drinks party these glasses are just the ticket. They "swirl" nicely too and aerate the wine as it should be done.n Stem is a little more robust than what the picture looks like. An elegant stemware! I'll be back for other sizes. I am very glad I purchased these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleStar

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It seems nice enough but only in appearance it's very thin and brittle and will break easily.
customer_reviews.author: CLAY23

customer_reviews.title: Great medium use glass.
customer_reviews.text: They are nice glasses for sorta everyday use. Meaning a bit too thin and fragile for rough use, but not Supra-fancy. They were bigger than I thought they would be, but still a very good glass. And since they are large, it allows your whole hand inside for easy cleaning. The one thing is that even though the angle at the bottom of the bowl looks great, it does not allow swirling of the wine very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J R Breckeen

customer_reviews.title: Great wine glass
customer_reviews.text: These wine glasses look great and are very durable. The stems are nice and thick so you don't have to worry about them breaking like glasses with skinny stems. Also the opening is nice and wide so that it's easy to get your hand inside to clean the glass. The only thing I would change about the glass is I wish the sides were taller. I like a nice, deep bowl on my wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Darien

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wine Glasses

customer_reviews.text: Shape is awesome and modern looking. Name easily suggests these are crystal, they are not. These GLASS wine glasses are crystal "CLEAR". product_meta.title: Luxbe - Crystal Wine Glasses 20.5-ounce, Set of 4 - Red or White Wine Large Glasses - 600ml
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:4| Size:V1.1LUXBE’s Wine Glasses Made from crystal and lead free glass for your safety, perfect brilliance and permanent clarity. Our wine glasses are great for use with full body white wines and soft body red wines and. The narrow, tall stem makes them comfortable to hold in your hand. Suggested wine varietals: Pinot Noir, Burgundy, Sangiovese, Chianti, Be Jealous, Viognier, Brunello, Chardonnay.
feature_bullets: IDEAL FOR FULL-BODIED RED WINES – This wine glasses, set of 4 are perfect for you to enjoy a full-bodied red wine, with a tapered rim that directs the flow of the wine toward the front palate and highlights the rich fruit while tempering the acidity.
MODERN SHAPE - You want your wine to taste exquisitely - this glassware delivers. The modern design allows for ultimate aromatics and flavor unlocking for that perfect flavor.
PERFECT SIZE - If you love wine, this crystal wine glasses come in at a fantastic 20 fl. oz. size. This size eliminates frequent refilling of your favorite wine.
TOP QUALITY - When it comes to wine glasses, LUXBE Glassware is known for its craftsmanship and use of beautiful pure crystal in their wine glasses.

LEADED-FREE CRYSTAL – All our wine glasses handmade with pure crystal, you don’t have to worry about lead leaching into your favorite red wine. As well as our wine glasses are dishwasher safe for easy clean up.
